name: SchemaService
description: Lambda for the NYPL Schema Service

scripts.deploy-development: ./node_modules/.bin/node-lambda deploy -e development -f config/var_development.env -S config/event_sources_development.json -o arn:aws:iam::224280085904:role/lambda_basic_execution -b subnet-f4fe56af -g sg-1d544067 --profile nypl-sandbox
scripts.deploy-qa: ./node_modules/.bin/node-lambda deploy -e qa -f config/var_qa.env -S config/event_sources_qa.json -o 'arn:aws:iam::946183545209:role/lambda-full-access' -b subnet-f35de0a9,subnet-21a3b244 -g sg-aa74f1db --profile nypl-digital-dev --layers 'arn:aws:lambda:us-east-1:946183545209:layer:lib-for-node10-wrapped-php7:2'
scripts.deploy-production: ./node_modules/.bin/node-lambda deploy -e production -f config/var_production.env -S config/event_sources_production.json -o 'arn:aws:iam::946183545209:role/lambda-full-access' -b subnet-5deecd15,subnet-59bcdd03 -g sg-116eeb60 --profile nypl-digital-dev --layers 'arn:aws:lambda:us-east-1:946183545209:layer:lib-for-node10-wrapped-php7:2'
